content: this is a triangular lace shawl with a floral panel gusset and floral scalloped edge this pattern is relatively easy and could be worked with an advanced beginner skill level of crochet there are simple flower motifs to create simple triangular sections to create the most time consuming part is assembly and weaving in all of the loose ends the entire piece requires 1000 yards of go ger i g weight yarn and has a finished size of 60 x 26
